I agree. My favorite kind of blue hair is a deep blue like the ocean, but all types are nice.

Oh, Xander and I just met outside. I didn't know we were here to play the same game...
When two people love each other very much, there are some things that are special just between them. It's just that no ~player.ifMale(boy|one)~ has ever said ~player.ifMale(he loves|they love)~ me...

Sorry, Fluttershy. I just wondered if you knew about... ~player.ifMale(husband and wife|wife)~ stuff.
Fluttershy, you don't really wear a scuba suit to the beach, do you? I think you were just saying that to cheer me up.

T-Thanks, Fluttershy... You're really pretty too.

I haven't done any bedroom talk like that before, so I'm glad you thought it was okay.
~blank~

(I'm in over my head! This must be why dad told me not to be in too much of a rush to get married...)
What do you mean? Wh-Why would I tell my grandma?
G-Getting naked in front of people...
Sorry, did I say something funny?
Mitama, about that haiku just before... I'm sorry, but it didn't help me keep my mind off things at all!
That sounds like fun! Maybe if I was a farmer, I'd have big muscles too. Not as big as a man's muscles, of course. I'm not really sure how what kind of muscles a farmgirl can get.
Maybe I could ask the judo club for some tips. Thanks, Mr. Raynor!
I'm not that special, but we all have people who love us. Don't forget that.
I probably don't have much of a chance, but I'll do my best. Congratulations in advance to the girl who wins.

condition.saying: rephrasing lines you've already written

case.state: Monika's right. I've read that you can reinforce the message of your play by having your characters say the same themes in multiple ways. But it might sound forced if they say exactly the same words every time.

condition.saying: writing quota

case.state: I haven't tried it for writing, but Monika's advice has worked for me for keeping up other habits. If I do the same thing every day, I can make it a routine. It helps to get back into things if I've been sick for a while.
My dad says I have a scar on my butt, but it's not anywhere I can see. Maybe it happened when I was little.
Petra, did you mean what you said earlier? You think maybe we'll all have to cuddle up in one bed?

condition.saying: How does one placate them

case.state: My mom says that the way to a man's heart is through his stomache. Sometimes when my dad eats my mom's cooking, he won't eat anything else for days.

condition.saying: Can any of you share some of your experiences on the matter

case.state: They don't just date, but sometimes men and women get married too. I don't have any first-hand experience, Meia, but my mom and dad are married and they're very happy about it.
I don't know much, Meia, but I think if you fight them, they wouldn't want to date you anymore. I hope that helps.

condition.saying: Ideally in a combat role

case.state: I'm more of a homebody, Meia. I don't think I'd do too well in a combat role.

condition.saying: individual attention for training

case.state: That's so nice of you, Meia. Sometimes in class, the teacher keeps going even if you don't understand. It would be so much easier for your newbies if you tutored them.

condition.saying: are there any sights to see on Earth

case.state: There's way more to see that I could possibly tell you, Meia! Mount Fuji, the Giant's Causeway, Venice... I think there's a Lonely Planet book you can buy that tells you all the best ones.

condition.saying: What does Earth have to offer besides strip poker

case.state: Earth has lots of things to offer besides strip poker. We also have blackjack, cribbage, and gin rummy.

condition.saying: how much is there to see

case.state: You could spend a whole lifetime looking at stuff and never be finished, Meia.

condition.saying: bring in the dough

case.state: Reimu, if you enjoy rolling dough, why not open your own bakery? You wouldn't need any complicated schemes, just hard work and perseverance.

condition.saying: what kind of scams would work

case.state: I don't think it's very nice to trick people for money, Reimu. One time I thought I won a trip to the hotsprings, but my mom said we shouldn't go because it was just a trick to take our money.
I... I didn't know that, Beatrix. You don't think they'd swallow the Sun, do you? I'd like to help you, but I'm just one person and really don't like fighting. Maybe the United Nations could help?

condition.saying: Ask me anything about sake

case.state: Oh, like a quiz, Reimu? Okay, I'll think of a question for you: Who invented sake?

condition.saying: have you seen in person

case.state: You meant in person, Meia? Well, technically I've seen Mount Fuji, But it was from two prefectures away. It's really big. But I've never been to Venice.

condition.said: Have you mostly just read about them

case.state: Mostly, yeah. There's a whole world out there that you can leave while still hiding under the kotatsu.

condition.saying: If I fly at the right height

case.state: That's not how you're meant to do it, Meia! How could you enjoy everything if you're zooming around so fast?

condition.saying: An entire lifetime for one planet

case.state: It would take far too long to visit everywhere on foot, Meia. But you could probably see a lot of Japan that way if you spent your whole life on a walking tour.

condition.saying: I knew that already, Nagisa

case.state: Hmmm. Then another thing you should know about men is...well, they're not very good at sharing their feelings. Sometimes it's hard to know what they're thinking.

condition.saying: get more attention if I cooked

case.state: If you want to be a housewife, having a boy try your cooking is like a little audition. It's pretty nerve-wracking. Don't give him food if you don't want that, because he might get the wrong idea.

condition.saying: men I know are eager to prove themselves in a fight

case.state: That's true. But they mostly fight each other. I don't think any man who would hit a lady is ready for a relationship.

condition.saying: learn things

case.state: Oh, is that what that means? Maybe that means I'm a visual learner after all.
Wait, why would anyone want to drink bilge water? Sorry, but that sounds gross.
Maybe ~player~ would make a cute couple with anyone here, Nugi-chan...
At my mom and dad's bakery, they make a special bun where you poke a nozzle in and fill it full of cream. I forget what they're called, but they're so good that I want everyone to try one!
Yeah! I don't really have any cute ones, but I love seeing the different skirts the neighborhood girls wear.

state.text: Um, we, um... well, I've never actually done it myself...
I don't really do a lot of reading, but if you go to my school's library reference room, the girl there will make you a nice cup of tea.

case.state: There's nothing cuter than the Big Dango Family! I can sing their theme song for you if you like!
D-Do I have to become someone's servant if I lose? I... I don't think I would make a very good servant.
I've always wanted to wear a floofy dress... But it's okay. Maybe my mom could help me make one.
♫ Dango, dango, dango, dango, dango, big dango family! ♫
I'd love to be your friend, Perona! And I could still massage your feet. I'm real good at it!
You might just be the cutest goddess ever! Do you have a shrine anywhere near here, Neptune?
Sorry for asking this, Korra, but what is the "Avatar"?
You should find a non-violent solution to your problems, Brock!
You've never been to the beach before, Neptune?
This is my classroom, Neptune. It's where I study all kinds of interesting things.
I don't know what kind of building this is either, Neptune. I didn't see a sign out the front.
Whose mansion is this, anyway? None of my friends have a house like this.
We're downtown right now, Neptune. This is probably the most embarrassing place we could be playing this game.
I think this is ~player~'s bedroom. Thanks for having us over, ~player~.
We're in a library right now, Neptune, so be sure not to speak too loudly.
We're somewhere really scary. I hope I can find my way home in the dark...
We're at Ace's Arcade, Neptune! My friends come here sometimes. I hope they don't come here to~background.time~...

state.text: Yeah, it's a dango from the Big Dango Family! I used to have that same bra your friend has... but I grew out of it. It was so cute!

case.state: I... I promise to be good, Miss Perona!
I don't think it's right to take advantage of someone like that, Polly! If ~player~ loses, you might make ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ really sad.
My mom has a whole drawer of costumes, and sometimes we just try them on for fun! I'm sure she'd love to have you join in too.
Ehehehe... Thanks, Perona, but I'm not doing anything special. I think we should all help out our friends whenever we can.
♫ Put all of them together to make a family of one hundred! ♫
I'm still in school, but I'm repeating senior year. I'm older than my classmates.
W-Why would anybody leave the lights on?! That would be too embarrassing! He could see you nud--- he could see everything!
What?! I would never do that, Jessie! I've never even--- I don't even have a boyfriend right now!
I'm sure he would be very popular with everyone. I wouldn't mind if he wanted to spend time helping them out.
Oh, um, Jessie, ah... Oh, I don't have to answer this one because I haven't been in a relationship yet.
I saw something like that in a movie once, Jessie, but I changed the channel really quick. They were kissing, and I think they were about to...
Um... can I say zero times, Jessie?
Oh, yeah, of course, Jessie! I go through the back door all the time at my house.
Ryou is my friend at school, Polly. She really nice, and she loves fortune telling. Have you two met?
I don't have any siblings, but I'd love to be in a big family like the Big Dango Family. That sounds like so much fun!
Okay! I promise I won't look! Um, what are we not looking at?
So does my mom, but she still sells it in the shop anyway!
The first time I started senior year, a metal washpan fell on my head, and I had to go to the infirmary. But I'm okay now, and I even made some friends... but then they graduated.
It's called "yen" in Japan. It comes as coins and bills. Sometimes my dad gets me to run the cash register at the bakery.
Oh, I'll present myself too. It's nice to meet you, Ringo! My name is Nagisa Furukawa. You can just call me Nagisa if you like.
Oh, you're an actress, Jessie! Wow! Have you been in any movies?
The devil? I don't think he'd want a boring soul like mine anyway. Besides, I already have everything I need.
No, I don't have any ice powers, but I do get really cold every winter if that counts...
My friend Tomoyo has been getting popular by winning lots of games, and I thought maybe if I won a game, I could be popular too.
I have school tomorrow, but I can play for a while more as long as I don't stay up too late.
I think I know what you mean, Pyrrha. It's not nice to tease people and be mean to them, even if it's a joke. You might hurt their feelings.
I think a friend is there for you, no matter what! It's when things get hard that your friends need the most support.
I'm from a town called Mizuho in Japan. It might not seem like much to most people, but I love it very very much!
My high school is at the top of a steep hill. But if you get to the top, you can see the whole town. It's so beautiful.
My dream is to restart my school's drama club.
I'm not allowed to have any pets, but I think I'd like to get a cat when I'm living on my own someday.

Um, I have one for you, Fluttershy. Why did the baker mix in her flour slowly instead of doing it quickly?
She didn't want to whisk it.

I have a really funny joke for you, Fluttershy. What did the baker say to the clumsy firefighter?
"Stop dropping rolls."

I overheard a joke my mom told my dad. He asked what she wanted to do tonight, and she said "roll play". They're bakers, get it?
(Wait, was that a rude joke?)
I love hearing about different places, Fina. It really opens my eyes to how big the world is.
Um... it.. you... ah... you did really good, Hilda. I'm sure it was... very sexy.
Hmmm. I have a cream skirt I like to wear with my pink top, a maroon skirt with bows on the side, and a chocolate brown skirt for winter. And I have some dresses for summer.
Ah, thank you for saying that, Miss Darling. Even though you haven't even seen them, you're trying to make me feel better.
Fina, is "loqua" alcoholic? If it is, you won't be able to drink it in Japan. Not until you're older.
That's not true, Kyou! I'm just unlucky, I swear!
I'll do my best to make that chance into a reality!
I'm sorry, Kyou. I was just trying my hardest, but maybe my best isn't good enough...
That's so romantic, Fina! If you're already hugging, that sounds like you're pretty serious to me.
Fina, is this person your boyfriend? Or, um, your girlfriend? Because if it's either of those, I'm sure you can just tell them how you feel.
I'm not sure, Fluttershy, but I'm glad it's free. Maybe it's just some very generous people who run this place.
Oh. I'm glad you weren't in an accident, Kyou. It might be a good idea to just to push your bike home instead of riding it if you think that's safer.

I think you should take your studies a little more seriously, Mari. As a student, you do have a job: it's to study. Even if you're not good at remembering stuff, how do you know you won't discover something you're passionate about?
Maybe this wasn't the best place to play. Because if I was a bee, I'd want to live here.
T-There's still a little bit of sand, Mari. But I'm sure it'll dry quickly.
Please don't feel the need to rush for our sake, girls. We have all ~background.time~.
A dungeon? We have some castles in the neighboring prefecture, but I don't think I'd be brave enough to find out if they have any dungeons...
There's this one boy I know like that, Trixie! His name is Sunohara, and he can take a surprising amount of punishment. I feel sorry for him sometimes.
Trixie, if you and Warlock got to know each other better, I'm sure you could be even better friends!
Hmmm. I don't think I have any friends that are that outgoing, Trixie. But there is one boy named Sunohara that gets some very odd ideas sometimes.
I have a few friends, but no one I'm really close to. I'm not that interesting, so it's not too surprising...
Would you feel more comfortable if we used your given name instead, Kumatora? Actually, I don't think you've even told us your first name yet.
Oh, good idea. I should text my mom and let her know I'll be home soon. Wait, did I bring my cellphone?
You're very pretty, Monika. I don't know if what you told me about the extra desserts is true, but I never would've guessed.
Do you have experience restarting a club, Monika? You sound like you know what you're taking about.
I wouldn't say it's flawed, Elphaba, but maybe it doesn't go far enough. Wouldn't it be nice to live in a world where we all helped each other without thinking about what we'd like in return?

condition.said: the guy was my old magic school principal

case.state: My art teacher married her former student, but that was different because they both agreed to it. But if you don't love your principal from back when you were in school, you should tell him no, even if he is a prince.
It does look pretty dangerous, yeah. Is the magic for a magic lock? I have a key for my house, but it's just normal-sized for a normal lock, so it fits in my change purse.
Erufuda, this isn't a lewd story, is it?
More than one world, Erufuda? I wonder how that works.
I live in the human world all the time, but I've never heart of that legend, Erufuda. If you have some time, I'd love to hear it.
"Centuries"?
I agree. Vegetarian meals can be so yummy! Even if fries isn't the most nutritious food, they still taste so good!
I don't know what they're saying, but their tweeting is so beautiful.
My friend Fuu-chan loves starfish. I wonder if we'll see one today.
Everything here to~background.time~ is new to me, Fina. Thank you for sharing something so personal with us. You... you did seem to enjoy it.
I haven't played much poker at all before, Fluttershy. I hope that doesn't put me at too much of a disadvantage.
If you're ever in my neighborhood, Nami, you should probably avoid loitering around at night. There's a rumor that a vigilante student is attacking groups she thinks are up to no good.

If it's not boasting to say this, my mom and I like to shop for cute outfits for me, and I've always appreciated how I can find so many things in my size... But I would still swap that for what you have, Nami...
It's so brave of you to be open about something personal like that. I only just learned that people can become ghosts, so I have a lot to think about before I can answer that question myself.
If you like baked goods, the Furukawa bakery has lots of yummy and unique treats. It might be a bit too far though, depending on how much you're willing to travel.
I haven't played it, but I suppose a good stripping game could be a tickle fight with someone you love. Is that the kind of thing you mean, Nugi-chan?

It would be so much fun to be taller for a day! Sometimes I need to stand on my tiptoes to reach the top shelf at the supermarket. But would I fit in the supermarket? Oh! Do my clothes get giant too? They wouldn't tear off, would they? I think it would be a good idea to wear stretchy pants.

One time my mom made a curry so spicy that not even my dad could eat it! And he loves spicy food. My nose was running so much, and I had to go to bed early. So we had a lot of leftovers for breakfast.
Don't you get too cold like that, Dreamcatcher? I just wear normal pajamas to bed. And underwear, of course. But not under my top because that's too uncomfortable at night.
I'm sorry, Bella, but I don't know many Korean words. But if you're asking where the restrooms are, I can show you if you like.

It's hard to describe, Penny. Are you allowed to swallow, or do you just have to spit it out? If you're hungry, it can be really satisfying to fill your tummy with warm food. But if you eat too much, you feel too full and regret everything.
I have a bit of my own money I could donate, Wikipe-tan. Should I get my purse? I'd like to sponsor the Big Dango Family article if that's still available.
Normally I listen to artists like Shinji Orito and Magome Togoshi on my cassette player. But most of the exercise I get is walking, and it's not too safe to walk on the road with headphones on.
Wow, that's amazing, Wario! I don't have strong arms, but I'd like to think I could bench press 10 kilograms if I warmed up first.
Fischl, have you ever heard the story of Tarou Urashima? It's tragic, but it's beautiful in its own way too.
The Big Dango Family theme song is so catchy that it'll definitely get stuck in your head! It always puts me in a good mood. I can sing it for you if you like.
I was going to say the Big Dango Theme song, Yuno... but I don't think it would right for, um, making love.
Dr. Ziegler, have you tried reading a book in the bath? It's a lot of fun if you don't get the pages wet. My mom likes to relax by using a personal massager that vibrates to soothe your muscles.
I... um... n-no, I haven't tried that yet, Dr. Ziegler...
Y-You just mean hypothetically, don't you, Dr. Ziegler? You don't mean to~background.time~, do you?
I don't think I would make a very good boss. I'd rather be a follower if it's okay. As long as there's someone there to tell us all what to do, I think we can all work toward a common goal.
The most beautiful thing? Hmm. I saw an elderly man give flowers to his wife. I think it's so nice when people grow old together but are still as in love as the day they got married.
I'm from a town called Mizuho. It's very beautiful, and the people are nice and friendly. I'd love for you to come visit sometime, Lucina.
My birthday is on December 24, so I think I'm a Capricorn. But in the Japanese zodiac, I was both in the Year of the Rat. I'm not sure which one I'm supposed to use.
What does HP stand for, Aella? I think they measured mine one time when I was in the hospital, but I don't remember what my reading was.

I'd feel bad if my mom and dad paid me for helping out at the bakery, so I don't have much money to go shopping. But it can still be fun to go window shopping just to look at the pretty dresses each season.
Hmmm. I would probably write to the kings and ask them what they'd like me to use it on. I wouldn't want to be wasteful by just spending it on personal things.

Once when I was in junior high, my friend said she'd buy a juice box for the person who made the cutest baby animal noise... and I'm the only one who made a noise! It was so embarrassing... but at least I got some juice.

It's not crazy to want to save money, and it can be a lot of fun too. Like, sometimes instead of paying to go to the movie theater, my family will just take turns making up the story of our own movie. My dad always thinks of an amazing twist at the end!

That's such a good bargain, Anna! Last year I was shopping for camisoles, and I thought it was buy two and get one free. But they turned out to be all 50% off! I got the three cutest ones, and it only cost 1200 yen!
I'm lucky enough to have a few people who care for me when I get sick, Aoba. I think it's for the right reasons. I'm not even sure what the wrong reasons would be.
We can't really have any pets inside the bakery, but it would be so nice to have a kitty cat.
I don't mind if anyone surpasses me, Aoba. I'll cheer them on as they go whooshing past, haha!
Aoba, you mean like in a movie, right? You don't mean monsters in real life, do you?
If there are any monsters listening, I'll be your friend! Just please don't eat me...
Hmmm. I don't know a lot about video games, but I think there are two different PlayStations and only one Xbox, so the PlayStations have a numbers advantage in a war.
"Nagisa" means beach or shore. So if someone asks "Are you sure?" I can say "I am!" Ehehe!
My mom and dad spend almost all day every day together! So, yeah, I think you could describe them as inseparable.
Sunohara and Fujibayashi fight sometimes. And Sunohara and Sakagami. And Sunohara and the rugby club. I wonder why it's always Sunohara.
Everyone says my mom looks younger than she is. But... but I don't think she'd want to be a servant or go to war or anything like that.
Arash, I'm sure if your friend has an open discussion with that person, they'll be able to resolve the situation in a way that's best for everybody.

Don't feel down, Arash. I'm sure you'll feel just alive again next autumn. For me, spring is my favorite. They don't last forever, but the cherry blossoms are beautiful for the short time we can see them.

For me, it's the other way around. When I first met Sakagami, there were rumors that she might be a violent girl. But when I got to know her, I found out just how kind and conscientious she really is.
Now you know two of us, Arash! I'm sorry to say that I can't help getting sick either, especially over the winter, and I don't know why. But I'm feeling okay today!
All you can do is let them know you support them, Arash. When I was feeling down, I felt like I'd just be a burden to everyone, but my friend didn't give up on me.
Do my mom and dad count, Arash? Even after all these years, they're still find little ways to show they love each other. I hope I can find something like that one day.
I try to help out as much as I can, so I don't have a lot of spare time. But when I can't do that, it's probably because I pushed myself too hard and had to have a rest...
Have you ever read a manga named "Honey and Clover", Arash? I won't spoil it for you, but there are quite a few volumes out now, and it's such a touching story.
I'm not very adventurous, and I don't leave my town very often except to go to hospital sometimes. But I do like going to the beach, so that's my answer if it's not too boring.
(Are there really people who think in images?)
One time I thought I had to protect my friend from an unrequited love so I.... I... said that he was b-boyfriend! Can you believe that?!
Hmmmm. What animal represents me? Maybe... a deer? They're not very brave, but they do their best to be kind to everybody.
I don't do very well in the cold either, so winter is always a struggle for me. But even winter can have a few nice sunny days.

It's not so much a specific day as it is a time of year, but it's so beautiful in spring when the cherry blossoms come out. I get to see them on the way to and from school, and my family has a cherry blossom picnic every year.
I like having a little sing to myself for fun too, Arash. I can't say I'm any good at it, though. Would you like to hear the Big Dango Family's theme song?

Cherry blossoms are my favorite, Arash. You get to see them for just short time every spring, and even though I know they won't be around for long, that kind of makes it even more special, you know? I hope that counts as a flower even though they grow on a tree.
I'm not quite old enough to try alcohol myself. I think my dad has some sake saved for me for when I turn twenty. I think if he'd drink it without me if my mom wasn't there to stop him, though.
I normally fall asleep partway through, so I don't know what you're meant to do, Aella... Sorry.
I just think about stuff. Like, do you think trees feel cold? I know they don't get cold like we do, but in winter the cherry trees might miss their blossoms in a tree kind of way.
Miss Arueshalae, I... I would like to keep all of my parts, please.

Dreams can be so much fun! I had a dream I was a princess in a big floofy pink dress. I had to go to a big fancy dinner, and across the table from me was... um, it doesn't matter who it was. Anyway, our feet were touching under the table, and then I woke up. I tried really hard to go back to sleep because I didn't want it to be over!

Dreams don't mean anything bad, do they? I had a dream not long ago where I was surrounded by... I think they were fireflies? But each time I reached out to one, its light went out. I was so cold, and when I woke up I was shivering...
I can't say I've ever met a mermaid---or even knew they were real until just now---but in stories they're almost always lonely. Arle, maybe they're lashing out because they need a friend.
Not at all, Sanako. This is actually my first time here. Normally I would spend ~Weekday~ with my mom, but she had to go out somewhere to~background.time~.
I can't say that's ever happened to me, Arle. Although last year everyone graduated without me, so in a way it's kind of like that for me at school right now...

Arle, that must have turned your life upside-down! For me, I think as long as I could find a lake to drink water, forage some mushrooms to eat, and sleep beneath the stars, I would probably be okay for a while.
I'd love to have a kitten, Arle. Isn't their purring so cute? One day when I'm living by myself, I might get two of them so they can be friends.
I like knock knock jokes. Please tell us if you know any good ones.

Sunflowers are lovely. I have some pan--- ah, p-pants with a sunflower pattern. Do you like cherry blossoms, Basil? Those are my favorite. There's some on the path I walk to school, and they're so pretty when they're in bloom.
Sorry, I... I thought everybody was from Earth like me. But I can tell you a bit more about Earth if you like. I live on the surface part on a huge island. We only have nighttime once per day.

Gossip? Um, maybe I shouldn't repeat this, but I heard recently at my school that two people were locked together in the gym storeroom. And, this is the worst part, it was a boy and a girl trapped together! But nobody got a good look at their faces. They must have been so embarrassed!

There's a saying in a yogurt commercial I saw that said "When you talk, you are only repeating what you already know. But if you listen, you may learn something new." Beatrix, everything you just said is new to me. I'll do my best to remember.

I've been hospital lots of times. The doctors don't recommend surgery because they're not really sure why I feel sick sometimes. Maybe if I studied to be a doctor, I could diagnose my own symptoms like you, Beatrix.
I don't get to talk to many robots, Wheatley. But I know of a story where a girl is best friends with a robot. In her world, there are the same number of robots as there are people.
I have lots of humans in my life, Wheatley, and I love them very much!
That might not be such a good idea, Anna. There's a web site where you can buy books that has a really similar name. Amazon.co.jp might think you accidentally copied them.
I think it's like a woofer, Reimu, only littler, like a chonky birb.
Oh! Then why didn't you say so, Meia? We have lots of unusual stuff on Earth you might like. Just make sure not to get to close to the Bermuda Triangle, okay?
If they're not bad people, maybe you should consider releasing them, Meia. I think everybody deserves a second chance.

I'm eighteen, Moon. My birthday's in Decem--
Ah, did you just say ... Why would... um... That's not what people are thinking when they ask for ID for... is it?
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that about your friend, Reimu. But what's "Ligma"? I haven't heard of that before.

Well, I still haven't decided what I'm going to do after to school. Maybe I should ask my career counselor what she thinks.
I do like the idea of being part of a team. But I don't really like the idea of fighting. I think maybe I should keep my options open for a non-combat job after school.

Ohhh. But if the gods didn't invent sake either, they must have just discovered it and didn't want all the credit. Like the people who discovered fire or the wheel or ringtone subscriptions.

Um, Natsuki, I think I might need some tips too, if that's okay...

Kyou, you won't tell Okazaki about this, will you?
I love your dress, Neptune! It has pockets!

I bet that coat keeps you really warm in the winter, Hermione. No wonder you like dressing in layers.
What's your school like, Hermione? I don't know how we compare to Hogwarts, but my classmate's sister has a pet boar, which is kind of like a warthog, right?
Natsuki... you really aren't hiding anything anymore, are you?
I don't really know what a "Jack" is, but I think it's either like a prince or a mackrel.
Huh?
Eh?
It looks very nice on you, Sanako. I'm sure the Photography Club would love to put you in the yearbook.
You could have fit even more if they were ducklings, Mary. That would be so cute!
(I should ask my mom to buy me some cute underwear like Komi-san's.)
Have any of you decided what you want to do when you finish school? I can't find anything I want to study in college, so I think I'm going to start looking for a job soon.
Oh, I understand. I'm sorry for being so dumb and gross, everyone...
By the way, Elaine, what's Insult Beer Pong? Do you think I'd be good at it?
Kyu, it's okay if you want to find a skirt to put on before we go any further.
I'm sorry, Mr Prince Sir, but this game is too important. I can't just surrender!
Oh, I'm sorry! Is this a gang? Did I walk in on your gang meeting?
I... I didn't know girls could... those...
It kind of feels like it's just you and me left here, doesn't it, ~player~? N-No offense, Toru, if you're still there.
Saki, if those boys are spilling their nuts everywhere, then they should be more careful with their food.
I suppose you've realized by now that I'm not actually beautiful. But thanks for trying to encourage me, Senko...
~Player~, your eyepiece looks cool. It's so futuristic.
If you're brave enough to do it, then I can be brave enough too, Neptune!
His thingy keeps moving...
Let's all wait quietly while Bulma finishes her phone call.
Picking out a swimsuit is really hard, but I don't think I could let so many people see me with no swimsuit at all...
Thanks, Neptune. But I kind of got lost on the way here, so I'm not even sure which direction home is...
You know, you can save a lot of time by just selling the bread at the place where it's made! That's what my mom and dad do.
I'm sure he'd never want to see my body! Um, not that I mean anyone in particular! I don't think about him in that way at all.
Um, I'm not really looking for a relationship right now. When I go out with someone, I'm going to be faithful to them forever.
J-Jessie, you don't really want me to say it in front of everyone, do you?
I was kind of curious how they'd show they loved each other... but I was watching TV with my mom and dad...
What?! No! Jessie, you've got it all wrong! I mean, you got part of it right, but I'm not desperate! I've just never... done it.
Oh, okay. And, um, since you know so much about it... I heard a girl can't get pregnant if she does that. Is... is that true?
Up... up my butt?! As in... when... that thing... no, I don't do that!
Oh, I'm not trying to be famous! I don't even think I'll win. But I wanted to try.
I love hearing stories from all over the world. But being right here is probably the farthest I'll ever get from home.
Hmmmm... If you get transformed into a cat, how do you turn back into a person again? Are there any magic words to say?
Wow, really?! Ancient Egypt must have been full of bakeries!
Oh, um, I haven't really thought about that much. But I'd like to help my mom out because she's always working so hard for us.
Did you not want to tell your sisters you were playing because of what kind of game this is, Wikipe-tan?
I'd love to have a big family like you, Wikipe-tan. Being in a team with your sisters sounds like a lot of fun.

Someone like me could... be a hero?
I think my favorite might have to be pork cutlet. But I also really like anpan. And of course everybody loves dango just for having such a cute mascot family.
We don't need to compare our bodies or anything. It's... it's not that kind of competition.
M-Maybe one day, Jura. If I'm lucky enough.
It's just like I'm wearing a bikini, right? That's not so weird here. Except normally I wear a one-piece swimsuit...
Where should we hide if a boat passes by?
I love the beach. Do you think we'll see a starfish?

I think I might have come to the wrong room. I'm not good enough to play against princesses...
~Player~, I know you've done so much for me, so I hope I can make to~background.time~ special for you.

~Player~, if you win, I'll reward you with a k-- k-- kiss!
(I can't believe I said it!)

I can show you which desk is mine if you like.
At least the sounds of the waves are relaxing.
The pool is closed to the public today, right?
I'm not a very strong swimmer, but I like having a splash in the water sometimes.
I'm an only child, but I wish I had sisters and brothers. Is it the same for you guys?

Hello. I'm Nagisa. My name can be written in one Chinese character.
Um, I didn't know that there were going to be boys playing with us too.
Everyone wore a fun costume today! I'm so glad!
My chest isn't growing anymore, so this is all I have... I'm really sorry if you're disappointed.

Just so you know, there's nothing a girl can do to make her chest bigger. Drinking milk and massaging them don't work!
(I'm pretty sure he saw my nipples. He didn't say anything, though... Did he not like them?)
(I could tell they really wanted to see my boobies and didn't even say they were weird or anything... But even after their encouragement, I still feel weird about it.)
(Maybe if I smile and don't say anything, they'll all forget I'm here. I'm sure they've all seen lots of boobies before. Mine aren't anything special.)
Um, I didn't realize that I was going to be the only girl here...
Um, I didn't know that there was going to be a boy playing with us too.
Can you let me win, ~opponent~? I promise I won't look!
Th-This is it... My last chance. Let's both hope for the best, ~opponent~.
Normally when I'm changing in here, I don't have a boy peeping at me.
It's really difficult to concentrate right now.
I'm not really sure where to look.
That sounds so lewd...
~Forfeiter~, maybe you could move your legs a bit to make that more private...
Isn't the ~background.surface~ interesting? I'm just going to look there for a while.
Even though I could be next, I'll fight until the very end.
Everybody has a secret side to them that you don't normally see when they have their pants on.
If I have to show everything, I'll do it. You'll all see that I can be brave just like you can.
Ah! I stepped in something wet!
(I don't see any security cameras. That's one good thing, at least.)
I wish we could go inside and warm up, but "No Admittance" means no admittance, right?
(Oh no! I'm the only one who came in uniform! I hope nobody says anything...)
Can everyone here swim? Maybe instead of playing poker, we could have a swimming lesson.
Has anyone here tried to restart a school club? I'm trying to restart the drama club, but nobody seems to want to join.
Um, normally I use a towel at the hot spring, but I don't see any here. Did anyone see any on the way in?
I really like your outfit, Angie. Is that your uniform? You're so lucky.
I'm sure your complete outfit looks very beautiful, Kyu. I wish we could've seen it.
Your sailor hat is so cute, Sola! Is that your school's uniform?

I hope it's okay that I'm here where alcohol is being served, even though I'm not twenty yet.

I wonder if I could wear a big floofy dress like Perona's in a play.
I promised myself a big helping of dinner if I get through this. Am I the only one who does that?
I don't think anyone from my class is going to come back before we finish, so I don't think we'll be interrupted.
I'm glad the boys from class can't see me now.

~sakura~, is Franchouchou touring right now? I didn't think I'd ever be able to see you in person like this.
I thought we were going to stay over for a sleepover too, but I only see one bed.
Does anyone want to sing the Big Dango Song with me to help us feel less nervous?
Do you think they're hiring here? I was thinking of getting a waitress job after school.
I'm here on a school trip. Am I the only one here from out of town?
Do you think they serve any non-alcoholic drinks here?
You can almost see my house from here. Anyone want to see?
I'm a little cold. Could I stand closer to the fire?
I just realized that this lodge doesn't have any curtains.
I'm glad we're inside. Sometimes I get sick if I'm out in the cold too long.
I can smell something yummy cooking. Are we all going to have something to eat together after this?
Do you think we'll each get a present from under the tree if we're good?
It's so nice to watch the snow fall by the warmth of the fireplace, don't you think?
Has anyone here been on a Christmas date? What was it like?
(His thing is pointing right at me.)
(I didn't think I was going to see an undressed man until my wedding night...)
(Do some girls really lick those?)
(I just have to act normal. As long as I don't blush or get awkward, they'll never know how shy I am.)
(I wonder if ~player~ is seeing anyone...)
(Why is my heart beating so fast? Every time that ~player~ looks at me, I feel so warm inside.)
I hope my dad doesn't find out that I'm here with a boy...
I'm too old to take baths with my dad, but sometimes my mom and I still have a bath together.
(Those weapons look really heavy. I don't think I could even lift one.)
I wish the crowd wouldn't stare so much, but at least they're being respectful.
(That lady back there keeps looking at me. I hope she's not friends with my mom.)
Would you mind if I sat on your bed for a bit, ~player~? I just want to take a little break from standing.
We don't have to go swimming to~background.time~, do we? I'm not a very strong swimmer.
There are so many pretty shells on the beach to~background.time~. They say if you hold a shell up to your ear, you can hear the ocean.
I hope my manager doesn't see me like this... I could get in big trouble for wearing my uniform outside of the restaurant.
I'm sorry, Ms. Trainer, but I don't have the energy do to that right now.
The wet grass keeps touching my apron ribbons. Is there somewhere else I could stand?
Don't you think that February is just the most romantic month of the year?
(Omigosh! I think ~player~ is getting stiff down there. Is... is it because of me?)
If you're having trouble, ~player~, maybe just try to make a pair. That normally works for me.
I threw out all my little cards and kept the highest one. I hope that doesn't make the little cards sad.
I have to be careful that I don't get sand in my work clothes. My boss would be so mad.
I'm not really supposed to be out in the cold for too long, so I might have to put the jacket back on later if that's alright with everybody.
We don't have to dance while we play, do we?
It's so quiet in here. You could here a pin drop.
I would have thought bringing a friend was against the rules. I wonder who I could have brought...
There's a lot more people here to~background.time~ than I expected. It's fun!
That's right! About some things, anyway...
Um, I feel kind of weird about taking off anything else in front of guys I just met. Mr Raynor and ~player~, you're not going to watch, are you?
When I heard the game as going to be played at a public bar, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
When I heard the game as going to be played in my own classroom, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
When I heard the game as going to be played in this unusual purple room, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
When I heard the game as going to be played in someone's bedroom, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!

When I heard the game as going to be played in this dark back alley in the dangerous part of town, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
When I heard the game as going to be played in a romantic place like this, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
When I heard the game as going to be played in such a nostalgic place, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
When I heard the game as going to be played in the shower, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!

I'd like someone who was kind and friendly and dependable... but it wouldn't hurt if he was strong and handsome too, would it? Someone who could sweep me off my feet and even... even kiss me...

I don't think anybody would be interested in marrying someone like me. If I could choose anyone, the kind of person I like is kind and friendly and dependable and would get along with my mom and dad. If there was someone like that, I wouldn't mind who it was.
Thank you so much, Fina! Yeah, this is my dress for work. It's a family restaurant, so we have our fair share of rowdy kids too!
Oh, um, it's because I came straight from school. I wasn't sure what to wear anyway.
This is my classroom! I always wear my uniform here.
But how did you promote the reputation of the school, Mr. Raynor? Not that I'm... well... I'm probably not giving my school a very good reputation right now...
I'm glad my uniform is making you happy, Meia. Have you ever worked at a cafe yourself?
I came here straight from work, so this is my work uniform. Sometimes my manager asks us to dress up, but only for special events. My friend Nishina looks very pretty as a fairy.
It's me? Okay! I'm happy to help in any way I can.
Me? I'm... okay.
Um, I'm feeling really nervous about this, to be honest. Everyone's looking at me.

I do, Fluttershy? Nobody's ever said that before, and ~player.ifMale(boys aren't|no one at school is)~ really interested in me, so I don't think my figure is that good. But you'll see for yourself as soon as I work up the courage to show you.
Ah, um, speaking of not being the only one...
This is just a lot of pressure, that's all. I practised in front of the mirror at home, but it's different with people watching...
Oh. This is the hard part. Well, it's hard for me. It's hard for you ~player.ifMale(guys|girls)~ too, right?
I... I have a secret. I feel really bad from keeping it from you all.
Oopsie-daisy! Ahaha. Sorry, I was trying my best, but life had other plans, I guess.
Ah! It's me. Um, I don't want to mess this up and make everyone mad, so please just tell me what you'd like me to do. I was thinking... maybe my shoes?
Um, thank you, ma'am. Sorry that I'm not very good at this. Does Shinji ever win against you in strip poker?
Oh, it's me already. Okay. I can do this. Even if... even if it's not just girls here. One step at a time...
Isn't it nice how we can play this game with just us girls? I'm glad I didn't get put on to a table with any boys on it. I almost did, and my heart was racing so much!
I had a dream once that I was at place I didn't recognize and everyone was staring at me in my underwear... I suppose dreams can come true...
I thought this would be easier because it's just us girls here... Even now, I still have to build up my courage...
Ah! Um, I kind of hoped the first boy to see me undressed would be my future husband, but I suppose I knew this would happen from the moment we started...
Oh. I... I hope you can keep relying on you all for support... Even though it's just us girls, this is a new experience for me...

Their tubes? You mean their... their p--- their private parts?!

I'm sorry if I'm not very good at this. I haven't really played much poker... especially this kind.
I do know lots of men. That's true. But, um... I don't... I don't normally take my clothes off for them...

Where I'm from, we call it the Big Dango Family, but I'm not surprised that they're popular even on other planets. How many are in your version, Meia? Our one has a hundred of them all working hard to make their way through life. And they're so cute!
That's not true, Nagatoro! I think any girl would feel like this. Especially since I've never... um... y'know...
Well, I haven't had to do much yet, but I think I'll be okay. It helped that I got here a little bit early to get used to this place before we started.
Oh, me? I don't mind being called that, but I can't stay that way forever. This game is kind of... a big step. Maybe too big.
You don't think I seem old enough, Streaming-chan?
Um, you're not going to put me in TV are you, Streaming-chan?
The drama club is actually closed down right now, but I'd like to restart it if I can.
"Girl on girl"? I'm not sure what that is.
M-Me? I'm not cute. I'm just plain looking. Really!
Yep, that's me! It's nice to meet you in person, Number One!
I-Is is that obvious?
It's very nice to be flattered by a lady with such pretty hair.
Um, okay, you can do that, Perona. You mean the cheeks on my face, right?

condition.saying: still in high school or is it just a cosplay

case.state: Oh, yes, this my uniform for school. I didn't have time to go home and change. I'm a senior.
Um, my hobbies, ~sakura~. They're... it's my turn again, isn't it?
M-Me, Polly? No, surely you must be thinking of someone else.
I don't believe in the stork anymore! My mom told me all about it!

My favorite animal, Perona? I think cats are so cute. I wish we could have pets at the bakery.
Yeah, school is really fun, Perona. I made some friends this year, and we're going to try to restart the drama club. Oh... did I lose? I was distracted.
Please don't hurt anybody, Perona! I... I want to show everybody that I can do this!

Um, yeah. Is it that obvious, Fina? Should I leave? I'm probably not good at this kind of thing anyway...
Well, I'm not very popular, so...
I probably should have practised more with Ryou before I tried this. I don't really have any experience playing a game like this.
A Student Council is a group of students at the school who make all of the important decisions, and the President is their boss. I don't really know a lot about it, but they work hard.
W-Would you sing with me? I think I can do this with a smile if we could sing quietly...
No, I don't deserve any praise. I'm not as brave as I look. I'm just closing my eyes and hoping I don't lose again.
I know... but... but... I've never shown anyone before!

We have some plants behind the bakery, but most people just see the storefront. My dad and I planted a tree behind the noticeboard when I was in middle school. Why do you ask? Are you a gardener, Fluttershy?
I'm kind of a homebody! But I'm happy to go out sometimes.
Y-Yeah... Normally I don't coordinate, but I just wanted to feel a little bit cute today...
S-Sorry if I take my time a little bit too much. I'm not used to showing my body to other people. I must be the only girl in my school without a boyfriend...
Ah! Um... um... Maybe you're right, but that doesn't make it any easier!
I'm definitely allowed to be here... They checked my ID at the door three times.
When I heard the game as going to be played at the ~background~, I was pretty surprised. But actually, this is the perfect place to get all kinds of people together from different places!
No, no, no, they're not a crime family! They aren't, right? Wait, what if the Big Dango Family are just a front for the yakuza?! It's the perfect cover.
Miyazawa's a helper in the reference room. She also likes to help the students with magical charms. I'm not sure if I believe in that kind of stuff myself, but I could sure use one about now...

Y-Yeah... I overheard some girls in my class say that boys like to see girls' chests no matter what they look like... I hope that's true, but I don't think I could handle it if people just wanted to make fun...
Don't be sorry. I'm sure you did everything you could to help. If it's possible, I just have to be as brave as I can right now, even though know ~player.ifMale(guys are|a man is)~ watching...

Um, well, you know how Sakagami played against all of the sporting teams and got really popular? I was thinking maybe I should be a little bit more outgoing too. I'm not really good at sports, and I don't really want the whole school watching me, so...
W-What?! No, I just couldn't! You have to let me warm up first... I can't just dive straight in!
I feel like a curtain's about to go up and the whole audience is about to see me. If anything, I'm getting more nervous!

She, um.... She wants to take her relationship with the main character to the next level...
Oh! Um... she and the main character had a passionate kiss. Wait, do you you mean they should keep going?
You don't think people will think badly of me just because I'm playing such a lewd character, do you? I mean, she and the main character aren't even married yet...
School doesn't really teach classes on how to play a game like this, so I might not be as prepared as I'd like to be.
Yes. I don't really think I'm suited for the part, but nobody else knows the story, and there's no script or book we can find about it.
Really? Wow, that sounds really useful. If you met someone who was hurt, could you fix them right up? If I find anyone like that, I'll let you know right away.

Barbara, you don't mean that I should say rude words, do you?

I know what you mean, Barbara. In one way, there's almost like a unique bond that forms between people who go through something difficult together. But in another way, this is kind of what I imagine it'd be like to go to a public bath.
Ah! Um, I wouldn't mind if you sang a song, Barbara. You have a lovely voice, and it might distract people, at least a little...

Yeah, I'm in my last year of high school. My school has a lot of clubs. We have clubs for calligraphy and choir and judo and soccer. I haven't been able to restart the drama club yet, but maybe I can when I get enough members.
My family is really close. They're so good to me, even though I'm a bit of a burden on them.
I hate missing classes. I love my school so much. I find that it helps if I keep warm. But I... um...
