We would never make fun of you, ~name~. We accept you for who you are.

state.text: Oh no! You accidentally shot off two things! You need to play more carefully, Aimee!
Why are you taking your clothes off on purpose? This... this isn't how the game is meant to be played!

case.state: If... if you put one strap back up, maybe you could count the top half as two layers. That sounds fair, doesn't it?
Does anyone else think the game is moving too fast? We almost saw so much more...
I was hoping you were wearing a bra beneath your swimsuit...
You're doing your best. I'll support you, even if no one else will.
Moon, are you losing on purpose just to save me? Um, thank you very much!

state.text: I'm not sure if that's cheating, but I completely understand, Sayla. You can't give up without a fight, so let's do our best!
Is that a piercing? I thought only bad girls got those...

case.state: You have to play fair, Sayla. That's what everyone else is doing.

state.text: You... you're not wearing a bra? But a boy can see... He can see your chest!

case.state: I saw two lights shining. It was only for an instant, but it felt like time had stopped.
Do you think that you could ever forgive me for making you do this?
I could never do that!
I'm sorry that you had to do this because of me...
You... you actually did it!
You're so kind and pretty.
Um, you're very lovely. I'm sorry if that sounds weird, but nobody was saying anything and I didn't want you to think you were a disappointment.
They're very pretty, and they make you even more beautiful!
They're so round and much nicer than mine...
You can use your hands like a bra, ~name~. It's embarrassing, but no one has to see.

Don't you feel more free? Sometimes on a hot summer night...
(...I go to bed like this)
I'm trying to tell myself that I'm just in the girls' locker-room. You can try it too if you like.
Please don't be embarrassed. I had to touch myself in front of everybody just minutes ago.
Don't bounce around too much if you don't want to, um... jiggle. Learn from my mistake.
(I was worried everyone was going to stop playing when I lost... just so they could laugh at me. Sorry, ~name~, but now we're skin sisters...)
(I still feel like someone is watching me, even though it's ~name~'s big moment...)
I-I'm not staring, I swear!
Ah! I'll... I'll cover my eyes.
I can't believe what I'm seeing!
Is that how big they get in Okinawa?
Am I seeing right? They're so...
Oh, wow...
I saw. I don't need to look again, do I?
They're so big! I... I'm sorry but I can't stop looking at them!
I've already shown everything, so I'm allowed to look, right?
For some reason, I am bothered by that girl.
It's going to be my turn right after yours. I just know it.
Compared to something wonderful like these, what we're doing is just child's play.
Wow. I can see why you agreed to play. You really get to show off...
I'm no good at all. I don't have what boys want like you do, ~name~.
Wow, it's like the Big Dango Family!
If you want me to be honest, I'm a little jealous, sure.
I'm at a loss for words.
Just so nobody is disappointed, I... not every girl looks like that.
There's a world of difference. You can't even compare us.
You remind me a bit of my mom. She's really nice!
Is it strange that I'm a girl too?
Wow! I wish I could be like that.
We don't all have the same strengths, but that's okay.
(I'm a little afraid to even look. Or maybe I just don't want to see that everybody forgot about me... Wait, no, I definitely hope they did.)
(Is this what ~player~ wanted? No matter how hard I try, I'll never be like her.)
Let's all get in the hot spring after this. You know, as a reward.
You should look away, ~player~.

state.text: And if you didn't wear such revealing underwear, maybe you'd have a bigger target to hit...

case.state: Is that why I'm twice as embarrassed?
W-What?!
But... but a girl shouldn't have to...
Are... are you really going to do it, ~name~?
I'm sorry this game has been so unfair to you, ~name~.
What do you want to see? A warm place full of secrets? A place where every day is fun?
Maybe this is not a big deal to you, but it makes me wanna cry just thinking about it.
You're so brave...
Isn't there anything else at all you can choose?
I'm so sorry that it came to this, ~name~!
I'm not a bully at all, I promise!
But... but you only just met me a little while ago...
No, you can't! You can't because...
Are you really going to do it?
You're ready to go that far? Even though it means...
Give her some space, everyone. She has an important decision to make.
Let's imagine that we're at a hot spring or a public bath, ~name~.
Could it be that the whole purpose of this game is just to get girls out of their panties?
I'm sorry for being luckier than you...
(This has to happen if I want to win, but does that make it my fault?)
This is at least partly my fault.
(If she can get over this hurdle, I think she'll be able to grow as a person...)
(I can tell how hard it is for her. I can hear it in her voice, even though she puts on a brave face.)
P-Please don't fight! I'm sure there must be a peaceful way to resolve this disagreement!

state.text: Hey, give those back! It's not nice to steal a girl's panties!

case.state: We get our panties back at the end of the game... right?
You can't keep those! Those panties belong to the princess!
Hang in there, Amalia! Even if you only have one life left, you can do it!
Oh no! You're so close to losing. I can't look...
You... you could still win. It's not impossible!
I was thinking you were going to win the whole game...
It's over, Amalia... We can see everything!
How can you stay so confident even though you've almost lost?
I believe in you! Either of us could still win.
Yeah! Just because a person lost all of their clothes doesn't mean they're out!
It's close to over for Amalia. We're sorry.
Help! W-What's happening? A-Amy, are you okay?
Oh, no! Bulma! You're not wearing any... any...
The girl was lighting the way for a moment. But when I got close, the light wasn't real.

state.text: Oh! It... did that just...
You can cover it, Lux! Oh, you dye your hair like my friend Sunohara? I wonder if he's got... Eep!
You can still count your glasses, Mei... Don't give up!
You could've taken off your bra instead... Now you're basically naked!
It's shaped like a heart!
I really thought you were blonde! I kind of feel a little tricked...
You could've taken off your bra instead... That's what I did...

case.state: Of course I've never had a girlfriend! But I've never had a boyfriend either...
Oh, you dye your hair like my friend Sunohara? I wonder if he's got... Eep!
B-Both of you?!
There's nothing but an empty plain stretching into an endless horizon.

state.text: I always wondered if people with red hair had it other places too...

case.state: I thought for sure that you'd have some hair... down there...
You seem so grown up, but you don't have any hair down there! I've heard that some people shave it off, but... I haven't been to a hot springs in a long time...
(It's so smooth!)
(Wow! Even despite everything, she's so confident! I could learn a lot from ~name~.)
I'm so sorry that you lost the game, ~name~!
What is this place? What am I doing here?
We really didn't mean to be so cruel! Please don't be mad...
Eeep!
Oh, ~name~...
I can't believe you took them off!
You can hide it with your hands to stop everyone from seeing.
Your special place...
I'm sorry, ~name~! We all saw it!
I'm sorry about your ~clothing~... The game will be over soon, so you'll get ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ back.
I wish we had towels...
I'm no expert, but I think what you have looks very nice, ~name~.
I'm a baker's daughter, but I haven't seen buns like that before!
(She did it! The hardest part of the game! Well... the second hardest...)
(How long have I been holding my breath? I didn't realize how nervous I was for her.)
(This would be the worst possible time for my mom to walk in...)
The girl looked at the path ahead. She knew it well.
If... if you're sure that you want to show us your privates, we won't stop you. Every girl gets to decide when to reveal her secrets, after all...
Are you sure you want to go through with this, ~name~? Revealing your, um, womanhood, I mean...
Don't give up, ~name~. We're all adults here, and... well... we've all seen what's between a girl's legs. So there's nothing you could show us now that could shock us, okay?
This might seem super tough, ~name~, but maybe it's not so bad... We're all the same underneath our clothes, after all.
(It's kind of comforting knowing we're all in the same boat.)
I'm really sorry, Noire, but I think I can only invite people who go to my school. But if we put on a play, I'll be sure to invite you!
When the game started and you and ~player~ got cards too, I knew there was a chance I might see a man's... thing. But I think it's only fair we accept out punishment for making you lose...

condition.saying: officer's school

case.state: Wow, officer's school? That's so cool. Should I be calling you Officer Bernadetta?

condition.saying: attending school for military command

case.state: That makes sense. The shy people are the ones who have the most to learn at a school like that.
Oh, do you have to leave, Fluttershy? Gosh, is it that late already?
I don't know a lot about royal dresses, but I'm sure each piece takes almost as long to take off as it does to put on. Please be careful and take all the time you need.
Don't they have festivals at the castle? My school is really strict with uniform most of the time, but we can get special permission during the Founders Festival to hold a maid cafe.
I think this is a much better idea than having no plan because then other people might make bad suggestions. What do you have planned for us this time, Estelle?
Do you really know how to do magic tricks, Estelle? That's so cool. We'll all be your audience, okay?
The saleslady at the lingerie store tried to get me to buy the whole angel intimate set too, but I couldn't afford the wings. Are you here to impress someone special, Meia?

If I remember right, wasn't there a pink chiffon slip that was part of the angel intimate set? If I had enough money, I'm sure the saleslady would have been able to pressure me into buying it. I didn't want to disappoint her.
So... I was wondering. Your highness--- ah, I mean Estelle. Are you sure it's okay to be playing a game like this with a commoner like me?
Estelle, did someone make you take off your skirt before I got here? Maybe you should skip this turn. I don't think it would be fair if we made a princess start in her underwear.
I like your outfit, Estelle. It's so... seasonal. My birthday is on December 24, so Christmas is a special time of year for me too.
You're so brave to be wearing a bikini to a game like this, Estelle. Sheer materials are so pretty... but they're hard to wear to the beach when they're see-through...
I'm sorry! I didn't mean to get a witch-princess mad with me! Please don't turn us into frogs... If I have to be turned into something, please turn me into a dango.
I've been meaning to ask, Fluttershy. Did.. did you swim here?
Every nurse I meet is so nice, and your outfits are so pretty. Is that what you wear to work, Barbara? I like how unique it is.
Sorry, ~name~, but I have to tell Meia something just quickly. I... I... Um... Th-thank you. Thank you for helping me keep my mind off things when they were at their hardest.
You've been so nice to me to~background.time~, Meia. Even though you're just as exposed as I am, you're still willing to go this far to protect me. You're... You're amazing!
Th-Thank you, Meia. I've never had that kind skinship with a stranger before... Oh no, did I distract you too much! I'm really sorry if you lost because of me.
I really appreciate what you just did for me, Meia. The hug, I mean. Not losing the hand. Unless... you didn't do that for me too, did you?
I'm sure everyone likes them, Natsuki. They're so cute. I... I have the same pair at home.
Y-Yeah. We couldn't see anything except your legs.
That's so admirable, Natsuki. Even now, you can't leave things half-finished. You'll see it through to the end.
You two seem like really good friends, so it's not like something like this could change things between you... right?
That sounds delicious, Jura! I always promise myself something yummy too when I have to do something hard. We usually have a lot of leftovers at the bakery.
Um, I'm sorry if I'm making you nervous. I won't cause any trouble, I promise.
I love my school! There are so many fun people, and I learn so much! Do you get homeschooled, Fina? Is your mom a teacher like my mom?
Your crew, Fina? The whole crew? How many people are in the crew? We don't really have any parking spaces...
I know what you mean, Fina! It's like being called on by the teacher in class... but the teacher doesn't normally ask you to take something off too...
I don't think my heart is ready! Give me a little more time to prepare myself.
I felt exactly the same. I don't know if my heart was ready, but I don't think I could have ever prepared.
You mean... it never gets easier?
This game is kind of exciting, isn't it? But I don't know if it's in a good way or a bad way.
Are they too tight? I have a pair that are too tight, but they fit me better in middle school.
What kinds of animals do you get to play with at the rescue center, Fluttershy? Kitties and ponies are my favorites.
Oh, but you're so beautiful! If there's anyone who needs to work on her confidence, it's me...
Please don't stop trying just for my sake! We have to give it everything we have.
Yeah. It can't be helped, after all. Are you taking off your shoes, Fluttershy? They're beautiful. Can we get a closer look first?
It's fine, Fluttershy. You can take your time. No need to rush into this!
W-Wait, Fluttershy! Think this through first. Maybe you'd like to choose your necklace instead?
Fl-Fluttershy, did you say you don't even mind? Are you secretly an... exhibitionist?
If it's not too much trouble... But you've been great company this whole time!
Oh, do you have to leave, Fluttershy? Gosh, is it that late already?
Did we do something wrong, Fluttershy?
That's such a pretty dress, Fluttershy! Did you say it was rare? Where did you get it?
I don't know if this is a good time to say this, but sorry that I made you sad earlier, Mr. Raynor. I wasn't trying to.
It might not be exciting, but it makes a lot of sense. I could learn a lot from a serious player like you.
You didn't need to dress up in a suit or anything, Mr. Raynor. You look very, um, professional!
Wow! Do you think I could get "jacked" like you, Mr Raynor? But I would probably have to buy bigger dresses if my arms got really bulky like that...
Now that you've traveled, did you find out if it was true, Mr Raynor? Is everyone where you're from like you? I get winded just doing the yearly physical exam...
That's terrible. I never heard about this in History class, but I did miss a lot when I was home sick last winter.
Earth is doing great! It's springtime, and it's the month for cherry blossoms again. Natural things are so lovely.
.. D-Do you play strip poker with the Raiders a lot? It must be really weird for you seeing them take their pants off. I mean, if you're not used to it...
When the game started and you got cards too, I knew there was a chance I might see a man's... thing. But I think it's only fair we accept out punishment for making you lose...
Oh, do you have poker in space too, Meia? How do you stop the cards from floating away?
You're such nice sister to think of Ryou's feelings like that. Is Ryou at home today? I'm sure she's cheering you on from there.
Um, haha, well... I'm sure the founders who picked our uniforms all tried their best!
Your pet baby boar? No, I'm sorry. I haven't seen him today. But I'm sure he'll turn up!
I can't blame you. Everybody is so talkative to~background.time~!
I... I do? I think sometimes it's okay to be pretty in a private area that no one will know about... But if you have to show off, wearing a two-piece swimsuit is something that bold girls can do.

Oh! I'm so sorry, Kyou! I wasn't trying to be improper or anything. You just have a really nice figure, and I was swept up in the moment. Not that I like you. That is, I do like you, just not in that way, if you know what I mean.
M-Me?! Um, if it's up to me, I excuse you from doing this. And... and you can put your bra back on too if you want...
Amen.
Is that the church you go to, Barbara? Some of my classmates go to a shrine for each new year, but it's usually too cold for me. And I've never been to a church before.

My family isn't very religious, but I like hearing stories about the town. They say if you bring someone true happiness, an orb of light appears. And if enough orbs of light appear, a wish can be granted.
Oh, I see. Um, you should know that's totally normal for a young woman. Even I.. when I'm talking to someone handsome... even I have thoughts like that. Sometimes.
Um, I can cheer for you... But you should really wait to explore yourself until it's time for the forfeit! You don't need to do it early in front of everyone...
Your prayers came true, Barbara. I'm so happy for you. If your fans were here, I'm sure they'd be cheering you all the way too.
But isn't it more fun when we all get along? Even if that means we lose sometimes too.
You must be much more active than I am, Meia. I try not to break a sweat if I can help it, but that can be difficult when I'm nervous.
A bra can still keep some of a girl's secrets, even if they're not big secrets. Oh! Not that I'm saying you have little secrets, Meia! They're perfectly normal secrets! I'm sure they're lovely...

Maybe it's because you're wise beyond your years? I know I'm a couple of years younger, but most of the girls in my class just want to go shopping and to the arcade. Oh, Meia! I'm sorry! I didn't realize you lost...
Wow. You've put a lot of thought into this. I didn't really come with any strategy at all. I'll be wishing luck to both of us, so maybe you won't end up going the whole way.
You don't need to wear something on your feet everywhere you go, after all. It's true. Like the bath, for instance.
Please don't go to any trouble just for our sakes. I can't speak for everyone, but I'd be happy with anything. Maybe you could just tell us a story or buy everybody a juice box.
I'm okay with it, but you should consider the feelings of everyone at the table. Your hair looks so soft and shiny, so maybe there's someone who's looking forward to seeing you let it down.
Of course, Reimu! Getting praised for doing hard things is something everybody appreciates.
That's true. Fun things, happy things, they'll all eventually change someday.
So you mean we should just enjoy things in the moment and not worry about the future?
I understand where you're coming from, Reimu, but you shouldn't use alcohol to drown your troubles! Now more than ever you need to be making good decisions.

I'm sure there's no way that ~player.ifMale(any boy|you-know-who)~ could stop ~player.ifMale(himself|herself)~ from falling in love with you, Reimu. But... but maybe ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ just too shy to propose right now.
Ah! Be careful where you point that camcorder. Some people might not like it if their faces or other parts are in the video.

This game is enough of a distraction, so I hardly feel lonely at all right now. You need private time too, Jura! I love my family very much, but that doesn't mean I should invite them to the bath or the restroom...
Jura, you're so bold!
It's much more serious than that, Jura! Panties are a girl's last line of defence against the whole world!
Oh, did you come with a friend to~background.time~, Sanako?
If you'd like to untuck your shirt, I'm sure nobody would mind. The disciplinary committee probably won't catch us.
You're so daring, Sanako... Even for a senior.
The most important role we can play is as role models, Sanako. We're representing the school when we're in uniform, after all.
Y-Your secrets are safe with us, Sanako. We won't tell anyone.
M-Me? Of course. What do you need, Sanako?
Me too. I think they must know that, right? If they wanted girls who like to show off, I don't think I'd be allowed in.
But it's so random, Natsuki, so we really can't be sure. Unless... are you maybe just naturally unlucky?
I think normally the heroine gets her powers at the very last minute, Natsuki. Or maybe you might get a wish granted.
We would never, Natsuki! If there are any bullies, we can stand up to them together! I... I hope.
I'm not sure how your shirt is going to help. Unless...
~Player.ifMale(He|She)~ can be like your knight in shining armor, Natsuki! And you can be ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ princess that needs saving.

state.text: Your hair is such a nice blue sky color, Meia. One of my best friends has blue hair, but he's a boy and it's more like an ocean blue.
You look really cool, Meia. Are you an astronaut?

case.state: Your jewelry is so pretty, Miss Fina. Are you a princess? Sh-should I be curtseying?
I'm sorry, your highness!
Um, if it's not too rude of me to ask... How old are you, Fina?
Oh no! Is it time for little Cupil to leave us already?
It looks as though there's no hope left, Fina. Will you be okay?
Sorry about this, Fluttershy. I'm guessing your day isn't normally like this. What do you normally do on a ~Weekday~?
I'm sorry to say it, Fluttershy, but it's your turn again. You're going with your necklace, right?
I don't know how it happened that two girls as shy as us both got invited to the same game, but know that I'm here to cheer you on all the way!
Oh no! Fluttershy... We should find whoever invented this kind of poker and have a serious discussion with him about how important modesty is to us girls.
Fluttershy... a-are you really going to do it?
I know this might seem like the end of the world, but I believe in you, Fluttershy! I want to support you just like you supported me!
That's such a pretty dress, Fluttershy! Where did you get it?
H-Hello. My name is Nagisa Furukawa. It's nice to meet you, mister.
Mr. Raynor, I hope this isn't rude of me to ask, but what year were you born in?
Mr. Raynor, you lost that one. Please don't be mad...
If you don't mind me asking, are you married, Mr. Raynor?
Mr. Raynor, do you work out a lot?
Mr. Raynor, you didn't win that one, and you don't have much left to go. I'm sorry. I'll respect your privacy and hide my eyes for the rest of the game, okay?
I won't pretend that I'm not nervous about it, but you've been really nice to me, Mr. Raynor. You've made me feel safe to~background.time~. So if you have to continue, it's okay. You have my support.
Hello. Maybe this is a bit late, but my name is Nagisa Furukawa. It's nice to meet you, Mr. Raynor.
What brings you here to~background.time~, Kyou? You... you didn't follow me here, did you?
You're so beautiful, Kyou! I can see why the boys like you.
Is your class busy preparing for the Founder's Festival, Kyou? I hope the boys in your class didn't vote for weird ideas like the boys did in mine.
You don't think anyone else followed us here, do you? I don't want Sunohara to see us like this. His face worries me when he gets too excited.
If it might help, I could teach you a charm that Miyazawa taught me.

Oh, Kyou, you don't have much left to give... I've never seen you without your ribbon before, so I hope I still recognize you when you take it out! I was just kidding, of course. Sorry for making a joke when things are getting so serious.
You're amazing, Kyou. No matter what happens, you're still willing to more forward. Your fan club would be so proud of you to~background.time~.
I'm not sure if you lost on purpose just to make me feel better... but thank you for being a real friend, Kyou.
Um, sorry to ask this, but are you sure you won't get in trouble for this, Barbara? I don't know what the rules are for Deaconesses, but I know idols aren't meant to do anything naughty.
Barbara, if you're not too busy, I'd love to hear about how you decided to become a nurse. Is it something you always wanted to do?
Oh, Barbara, is it time for your transformation sequence?

Barbara, sorry for interrupting. Um, you don't have to doing anything too serious right away. Have you ever thought about letting your hair down? Your fans might really like it if you did that instead...
I hope this is okay, Barbara. I know you're a medical professional, and I heard they don't get shy about the human body...
Meia, you still seem so calm despite everything. It's okay if you want to be a little sad.
I'm sorry if it's not the right time to say this, Meia, but you should be proud of your body. Even if you have to show it all off, we'd never think badly of you.
I hope don't mind me saying so, but your hair is so beautiful, Miku! You must spend a long time combing it.
Nagatoro, is it? It's nice that you could come to~background.time~. And you brought your... friend?
I hope this is okay to ask, Erufuda, but... are you expecting?
It was smart of you to come all rugged up to~background.time~, Nadeshiko. I kind of wish I'd brought a big warm scarf like that too.
Aoba, I've been meaning to tell you how professional you look in your uniform. Does it come with a hat?
Excuse me, Estelle, but I think you might have lost this one. It's nice to meet you, by the way. Sorry if I didn't say that before. My name's Nagisa. Oh, you already know that. Anyway, sorry!
Your turn again, Meia. I'm not sure what your plan is now, but you don't seem worried, so I'll leave everything to you.
Ah, it's Miss Grunt's turn. Would it be okay if I called you by your first name: Magma?

I had never met a real idol before ~background.time~, so it's a real honor, Cagliostro. Your hair is so pretty, and I was just wondering what kind of shampoo you use. It's okay if you can't tell me because it's a trade secret.
Your shrine maiden uniform is so beautiful, Reimu! But won't they miss you at the shrine while you're here?
Reimu, did you say you were from Gensokyo? Which prefecture is that in? If it's around here, I don't think I've heard anyone mention it.

Sorry, but it's your turn again, Reimu. Um, do you really think this is a good place to look for love? How would you know if ~player.ifMale(he|they)~ really liked you for who you are? Maybe ~player.ifMale(he|they)~ just got excited to see you undress...
I'm not really sure what we should do when a shrine maiden loses. Is there maybe a prayer or a blessing we could say to make it right?
I've been wondering, Reimu. When a person donates money to a shrine, where does that money go?
Oh. I hope you can forgive us. We're all on your side, I promise. It's just this game that's pitting us against each other.
They say if you bring true happiness to a person, you might get a wish from your heart granted. I think... I think that might happen for you Reimu...
I like your handwriting, Komi-san. Are you in your school's calligraphy club?
Your name is Mia, right? If you don't mind me asking, are you a priestess?
It's nice to meet you, 9S. Sorry for not saying that earlier. Um, I like your name. It's so unusual. Does stand for somethinmg, or is it more like "Sssssssss"?
Sanako, aboout that uniform... Do you go to Hikarizaka Private High School too?
Um, Mr. Dunban? Or just... Dunban? I wasn't sure what to call you. What would you prefer?
Sorry, Yumeko, but you're the unlucky one. But don't give up. I'm sure you can recover for next time.
Even though I don't think I've seen you around school, Sanako, you do still seem familiar somehow...
Oh, I just remembered! Sanako, would you like to join the drama club? I'm trying to restart it, and we go to the same school!
Sorry to bother you, Yuri. I think it's you. Um, you have beautiful hair, by the way. It's so straight. It doesn't matter how much I comb my hair, it always sticks up a little bit.
Jura, pardon us, but I think you lost that one. Also, um, are you really a pilot?
It's your turn, Sanako. I know you said you're excited for everyone to praise you, but...
Excuse me, ma'am, but I think it's you. It's nice that you could have the ~background.time~ off work to play with us.
Sorry to bother you, Yunyun, but you kind of lost that one. Don't be discouraged. I think you made a good effort, and I hope we can still become friends.
Barnette seemed lovely, Jura. How long have you two been a couple?

It's your turn, so I hope this is an okay time to ask, Jura. If you and Barnette have a baby, have you decided if you both want to have one, or just one of you? I'm not really sure how it works in space.
Sorry, Shamiko, but I have a question if that's okay...
Sanako... um, no need to do anything drastic... You still have your glasses and maybe your ribbons?
I'm so sorry, Sanako, but I think you're out. I know you'd like to show off for everyone, so I'll do my duty and watch every moment until the very end!
Jura, I think you might get scouted as a model when you're here on Earth. You might even get to be on the front cover of a magazine.
Oh no, Jura! I think it's you again. Unless... this is what you wanted? Are we your test audience?
I wouldn't trade my mom and dad for anything... but I wish I had been born beautiful like you, Jura...
It's okay if you don't want to continue, Natsuki. After all, you didn't even know we were playing poker today.
Sorry for all the trouble. I'd like to make it up to you somehow, unless that's too much trouble too.
Natsuki, do you like haiku?
It seems like you know ~player~ pretty well, Natsuki. It must've be nice seeing a friendly face when you came.

~Player~! Ah, y-you have to turn around now. Please. I know you just want to help, but... but... ~player.ifMale(you're a boy and she's a girl|she obviously likes you a lot)~, so, um, it's up to you how far she'll go.
Oh no! It's.. it's okay, Natsuki. Just think of happy things. Like cookies. Or shoujo manga. Maybe... maybe in your story this is the big moment...
Oh, Natsuki... I can only imagine how nervous you must be right now.
I'm sorry, Natsuki. But... but maybe this experience will help us grow. As people, I mean. I don't think we're going to get any taller...
Oh, Natsuki... It was hard enough for me, so I can only imagine how nervous you must be right now.
It's Noire, right? Your costume is so pretty. Is that what you wear to work, or are you cosplaying a character to~background.time~?
Mari, it's time to get started. I hope that's okay. Doing something bold like this might take some getting used to..
Stay strong and don't lose focus, ~name~. You can do it!

condition.saying: the first sandwich ever made

case.state: Wow, that's so interesting, Hermione! If you know any other facts about bread, I'd love to hear them!
Um, when it becomes time for what, Mr. Fate?
You're so kind and tall, Yusuke. Would... would you mind if I started hiding behind you now just in case?
~Name~ looked great in glasses, and I'm sure you would too, Miss Darling!
I... I know about the forfeit! Don't worry. I'm not running away.
I'm not a silly kitten! I'm going to be brave, Jessie. Like a lion.
It might be easy for you, Jessie, but the forfeit is the hardest part of the game for someone like me!
Yeah, that's it, Fina! Sometimes we call it "White December" at my house. I think it's a European tradition, but we celebrate it in Japan too.
I'm sorry for talking about my family, Fina. I wasn't trying to make you think about anything sad.
Um, I don't mind if you look a little closer, May. If I have a scar back there, I'd like to know about it.
That's good, Leonie. One time a customer caught me in the shop in my pajamas when I was getting a bread roll for school...
Sorry, ~name~, but I have to tell Meia something just quickly. I... I... Um... Th-thank you. Thank you for helping me keep my mind off things when they were at their hardest.
Wow! A royal flush! Nobody could have beaten that, right?
So lucky! There's not much competing with a royal flush, is there?
I didn't bring any swimwear myself, so I'll just watch from the edge of the water if that's alright. I can be the person who makes sure the cellphones don't get wet.
It's just that... well... why are you wearing a wetsuit? I'm sorry if that's rude to ask.
A-Already? Okay, I support you all the way. That wetsuit is kind of rubbery, isn't it? Would you like one of us to help you?
That's so bold! I'm sure you'll find someone to celebrate with. I've never been to an event in just my underwear before, except in a bad dream one time...
But what if people stop liking you? How can you make it up to them?
I wouldn't want you to lose the respect of your subjects just because you made some new friends. You shouldn't have to give up the claim to the throne over something like that.
Oh, I see... Wait, Estelle! You're not trapped in some prince's harem, are you?! I'm sure we could rescue you if we all worked together.
Christmas is meant to be a romantic time of year, so a lot of people like to go on dates. But it can get pretty cold too!
Well it's not completely transparent, but it kind of makes me feel like I have x-ray vision. It looks good on you because you have a really nice figure... unless we weren't supposed to know that yet.

So she just taught you how to turn your clothes into frogs? That doesn't seem like a very good idea for when you want to get dressed later, but I suppose you could cover yourself strategically with them...
Ah! There's... there's really nothing under there. I thought you were just kidding around before...
Ah, I see. That makes sense. If I was wearing a rubber suit right now, I'd probably be sweating like crazy.
I'm sorry, Estelle, but could you repeat that last part? Um, do you want help? Are you stuck?
That's too bad. But at least you got to dress up today! Or dress down, hehe!
Is that why you're here? Ah, um, would you like me to help, Estelle? I promise I won't get seduced or anything.
I've never seen real stage magic before! I can't wait to see this trick.
You must be so busy! I hope your bosses are nice. They must be if they gave you time off to play to~background.time~.
Ah! Oh no! Your... your... your boobies are completely gone, Jura!
I wasn't sure who I'd meet when I came here. I thought it might all be people my age, but at least only one other person from my school is here.
I wasn't sure who I'd meet when I came here. I thought it might all be people my age, but at least not everyone here is from my school.
(She's flashing her panties! Didn't her mom ever teach her to be more careful around boys?!)
(She's flashing her panties! Didn't her mom ever teach her to be more careful with that kind of stuff?!)
Sorry. You told me that, but I forgot. I thought every girl dreamed about being a princess, or about marrying a prince.
Wow! You have the matching bra too! I really wanted that, but the store said they couldn't order it in my size.
Just a little cold maybe, that's all.
Like a... like a c-crush...?

It's impossible to know what ~player.ifMale(a boy|someone)~ is thinking without asking ~player.ifMale(him|them)~. Given the circumstances, I'm sure ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ wouldn't mind if you had a special message for ~player.ifMale(him|her)~...

You're royalty? Oh, wow. I was daydreaming earlier, so I'm sorry if you were announced. I didn't even wear my nice dress! I've never been friends with a princess before. Do you live in a castle? Are you married to a prince? No, of course not. Unless it was an arranged marriage? That's personal, so I shouldn't ask about that. Do you have a tiara? What country are you from? Is your dad the king? Sorry for asking so many questions...
It's like when Fuu-chan came to visit, and me and her and my mom all had a bath together. It didn't feel weird. It just felt... normal, you know? Maybe you remind me of Fuu-chan.
That's the thing, we don't have an advisor yet...
You are very pretty, and I'm sure I should remember you if we've met... Oh, I'm sorry, I'm getting distracted. Ah, are you taking off your shirt already?
Oh, an Air Pirate?! Are you sure I shouldn't curtsey?! Or bow? I don't want to get in trouble with a pirate! I'll be good!
Oh! I'm eighteen too! Don't feel bad if you've been a bit of a homebody growing up. You've got your whole life ahead of you!
Oh? Ohhhhh... Cupil, let's hide our eyes, okay?
If wishes were real, I'd still use mine to save you.
What kind of experience? Like an apprenticeship?
If it's just three of you, maybe we can have you over for lunch! I can help my mom with the cooking. Are there any foods you don't eat?
Cupil?
D-Do it!
I believe in you! You can make it!
Fina! I had no idea you had such naughty thoughts... Does... does exposing yourself really make you feel good?
It's kind of like a scary movie. I'm not good with scary movies either, but I'm okay if I have someone to hold on to.

(Has Fina been thinking about lewd things this whole time we were talking? Wait, about me?! No! Definitely not. She probably just likes ~player~. ~player.ifMale(He's really handsome|She's really beautiful)~, after all.)
She did an amazing job! It really suits you, and those little sleeves make it even cuter.
Help out at the rescue center? What do you mean?
Do people adopt the animals? I hope they can find new families...
Eh?! But those are the same kind that I... Um, forget I said anything!
I don't want to be selfish. It's just that some things should stay private for a girl...
I know! But... but...
I-Isn't she so pretty and brave? L-Let's all give her a round of applause!
Aw, that's so sweet! We both picked out the same panties.
I'll do everything I can to support you! In return, could you...?
Even in your time of trouble, you're thinking about someone else. I'm really touched.
Really? Oh, but after the game...

Those are... are... very nice.
(Oh no! We wore the same underwear! Is she going to be mad at me? Maybe I should've worn two pairs after all!)
O-Okay... but I usually feel more confident when I'm wearing a bra. At least when I'm outside the house...
It's the biggest deal! But if you're okay with it...
I think it's more embarrassing for everyone if some of us are completely undressed and some of us aren't... So thank you.
Th-the whole dress? Right now? In front of everyone?
Huh? You did? Ah! ... We're so alike, aren't we?
I wasn't sure who I'd meet when I came here. I thought it might all be people my age, but at least no one from my school is here.
It's ~Month~ 2004 now, so that would make you, um.... thirty-four? Wait, 2470? Huh?!
N-No! I definitely wasn't looking at your gun! Or, well, it's just... I don't think I've ever seen a real firearm before. Except on TV.
Oh, I'm sorry. I just had a question about, um... married people things. I didn't mean to pry.
If she didn't appreciate you, it's her loss! I'm sure you'd be a very nice husband for any lady your age. You deserve someone who is right for you.
My dad told me that a man's peak physical fitness is in his thirties. But I thought he was just kidding around.
O-Okay. I just didn't want anyone to feel awkward...
In a way, it's like you've been our chaperone to~background.time~. Um... until this part, I mean...
Even so, you came prepared. You seem like a very capable person.
I thought you were a professional... motorcyclist? I'm not sure, but you seem like a hard worker!
Wow, really?! I think you've inspired me. I bet you can open any jar you want!
Is it too difficult to visit? It must be hard to invite new friends to see the town where you grew up.
It's not healthy to keep all of your feelings cooped up inside. If you're suffering, I'm sure we'd all be willing to do what we can to make you feel better. Right, everyone?
Some places are hilly and others are bare. Not everywhere looks like where I come from.
Do your best! You have to stay strong for the sake of the game, even if you have to see things you've never seen before...
It's... it's okay. I don't blame you or anything. This is just the hard part, that's all...
Oh, sorry for getting it wrong. I learned that everyone who goes up into space is an astronaut. But I don't know much about star wars kinds of stuff.
Oh, um, a "boy" is a young man. They're so cute when they're little, and... and some of them are cute when they're older too.
Oh, right. But if the gravity turned off, it would be chaos!
Now you know my secret... You won't tell anyone, will you?!
T-Two boys? A-At the same time? I wouldn't want to be greedy... Um... you've never gone out with two boys, have you?
Are you going to dress up as a maid too? That could be so much fun!
I understand that you want to keep this just between us, but please don't resort to violence if we get more visitors!
For Miyazawa's charm to work, the first thing you need to do is take off your shirt. I'm sorry, but I'm sure it'll be worth it in the end!
B-But that only leaves... Oh. I'm sure your ribbon wouldn't mind if you took it off for just a moment!
If you can do it... maybe even I... maybe even I could too!
Everyone does seem particularly excited when it's your turn. More than any other girl here, I mean.
What did she predict for you this time, Kyou?
I'm always happy to have my blazer when it snows, but on warm days before we change into our summer uniforms... sometimes I overheat a little. I don't want to complain, though. I can endure it.
Oh no! I... I'm sure I don't know anything about that!
Are you nervous too, Kyou? I always talk more when I'm nervous.
N-Next time? Um, I only have a one-piece swimsuit, so I don't think I could.
No, I'm here to support my friend! You need all the support you can get!
I-I'm excited for you if you're excited. It's great that you're able to face this so enthusiastically...
Oh, I wasn't supposed to talk yet! Sorry! Please, keep going.
That prayer was really pretty! It made me feel like I could do anything to~background.time~.
That must be it. I've always wondered why. I have so many questions about that sort of thing, but there's nobody to ask.
Oh. Yeah, there are a lot of magazines that are just busybodies into the lives of famous girls. Not that I read magazines like that.
Oh! We're the explorers, and you're the... hills? That's a pretty metaphor, I think. It's kind of a bit rude too... but that makes sense for this kind of game.
"Then"? Oh! Um, I can if you want me to. I've never cheered on a girl while she did that before...
Oh, so it's a secret. Now I understand. Even if I become your fan, I definitely won't tell any of your other fans.
Oh, I see. That makes sense. If you worked at the church, I'm sure people would come to you for help.

I just thought... I just thought if you could use magic, maybe you might be able undress ~player.ifMale(in a way that might not get boys too excited...|without needing help with your zipper. If you have a zipper. I'm not really sure now.)~
O-Okay. As long as you think this is something your sister would do, I'm sure you'd have her support.
If it helps, I'll try to think of you as one of those diagrams of the human body except much more beautiful.

I think it's so wonderful that you're willing to give it your all! Your quartermaster is a smart lady, because learning how to lose is an essential skill. Even though you might not win to~background.time~, nobody truly leaves here with nothing. Or at least that's what they tell me.
Oh! You're already, um... What was I saying? I'm... I'm not really able to be too active. B-But maybe that's why you seem so confident. It's because you know you're the best you can be...

I never even thought about if mine would be good for combat... You're in such great shape, but I keep forgetting that it's because your job is so dangerous! I hope you can find some time to relax, even if that isn't right now...
You can't give up yet! There's still lots of things you can still do while you're young. Um, but not right now, because you should have clothes on while you do them...

N-No! I didn't mean about your chest! It's just that if you're feeling sad on the inside because you're already this far, then you don't have to hold is all inside. It wouldn't be fair if we didn't all get to express ourselves.
Um! Ah, well, what you were wearing before didn't leave a lot to the imagination, that's true... But I had no idea it was on purpose!
Dangerous?! N-Now that you mention it, ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ does look kind of dangerous. ~player.ifMale(He|She)~'s not a delinquent, is ~player.ifMale(he|she)~?
That's so kind of you to offer! But that's okay. After all, this game... Well, it's kind of the opposite of dressing up, isn't it?

That makes sense. Sometimes it's easier to be brave if you don't think about what could go wrong. But, um, did you prepare yourself for what can happen at the end of the game. The, um, y'know... The hardest part.
I'd like to be able to read a book in the bath, but it's too steamy.

I wasn't trying to say it looked like you made it yourself. I'm sorry if I offended you. What I meant to say is that you could be an idol if you wanted to, since you already have such an cool sense of style.
Come to think of it, I didn't even know shrine maidens were allowed to play games like this. But I don't really know if it's an official rule or anything.
Oh, I hope you can find your way home then. If we can find a personal computer later, maybe we can print you some directions from MapQuest.

I suppose that makes sense. But wouldn't you get embarrassed auditioning so many people with your ~clothing~ off? I think for me, I'd like to get to know someone really well before I asked them if they had, um, carnal attraction to me.

I do have a little bit of money saved up. But I'm sure it would make you feel uncomfortable if I paid you for... um... defrocking. So it's probably better if you do it on a volunteer basis like the rest of us.
Oh, so it's sort of like your income. But what if someone has an extra special wish and puts in more? How does that person's thoughts get conveyed properly?

I think I'm starting to understand your feelings better, Reimu. You're trying to escape from your life in a dangerous neighborhood. That must be why you drink and why you want someone to whisk you away.

Maybe that's just how the magic works. If your wish is for a lover, this could be how you can make ~player.ifMale(him|them)~ truly happy. Unless... unless it makes ~player.ifMale(him|that person)~ have impure thoughts...
Yeah... But someone taught me that it's worth pushing myself to go to new places and try new things. If it wasn't for that, I wouldn't even be here.
Oh, I understand. That's your personal decision, so I can respect that. But I'm sure you do have beautiful hair under your ribbons.
My mom says you shouldn't get married to try to fix your problems. Otherwise you'll just bring your problems with you. You have to work on yourself first before you're ready to support someone else.
Yep! You're fine as you are! Though I'm sure there are little things you'd like to work at getting better at. I'm going to work at being better at card games.
You don't want to have any regrets. Oh, but maybe sometimes the regret is not drinking the sake? Is it really that sweet?
Uh huh. Though I think anyone can look ~player.ifMale(handsome|beautiful)~ if you love them enough. It wouldn't be fair to ask them to be as nice as a pretty shrine maiden like you are.
~player.ifMale(He's|She's)~ probably waiting until you two are alone until ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ confesses. But I'm pretty sure ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ likes you.
How long did it take to grow that long, can I ask? Did you have to start growing it before middle school?
Your crest is for senior year. Oh, but I suppose it would have to be to play a game like this.
My mom creates a special pastry every week. Whenever a customer tries one, they always say they couldn't eat another bite! Do you like sweet things, Jura?
O-Okay. If you trust Barnette, I do too. Just... don't lend the cassette tape to any boys. Just in case.
I... I didn't realize. That you were a couple, I mean. I... I don't know if couples can play as a team. Maybe Barnette should get her own cards.
That's true. Even so, I think there's a lot to be said for being able to be content with being alone. Even if everyone else leaves, you'll always have yourself to talk to.
It's not a competition! Um... well, I suppose it kind of is a competition. But we don't need to compare ourselves to Barnette. She's doing her best.
That's true... It seems like that's all anyone looks for in a girlfriend, and you have it all, Jura. You're amazing.
That's a good attitude to have. Don't think about how we only have a few small chances before things get serious. Think of it as your first opportunity to start joining in with everyone.
You have such long, beautiful hair. I was just wondering... how do you manage it? I thought if a girl joins the defence force, they have to cut their hair to fit into their helmet.

Robin is a pretty name, like the bird. I thought I heard someone say you were an archaeologist, Robin. Unless... Wait, you wouldn't steal from archaeologists, would you? I don't even know if archaeologists travel by ship.
Oh, wow! That's so exciting! Have you decided where you want to live? Are you going to use her last name or yours? Do you want a big family?
You're so lucky! I'd love to be a mom someday. Even though I know it would be pretty hard on my body.
You're not one of those promiscuous girls my mom told me about, are you?
Ah! I-If you want to, then please go ahead. I'm... I'm sure you'll be very popular...
S-Sorry! I didn't mean a senior citizen, Sanako! I meant in school! The color of your uniform crest is for senior year!
N-No. Um, if I don't look, then I won't be lying if a teacher asks if I saw anything...

state.text: We should give you some privacy. We could all turn around if you'd like.

case.state: According to the TV, you can never be sure who or where a model scout will be... so I guess it could be someone here. Probably not though.
Don't tell me not just us but everyone in the whole nation is going to see!

It's not just that you're nice and you're beautiful, it's that you're so ready to show everyone. I'm not surprised that you're dating already. I'm sure... I'm sure there are lots of people who want to date you.
I don't want you to feel pressured...
What do you like to do to keep your mind off things, Natsuki? Maybe we could do that.
Haiku can be so simple and beautiful that they almost seem easy to write.
I wish I had a friend here as supportive as ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ is for you. How long have you known each other?
Oh, wow. That's so smart, Natsuki! I don't think I could do that because none of my shirts are too big for me.
In shoujo manga, even when times get tough, the heroine will always pull through.
No matter what happens, we're in this together. And this is a really big step.
S-Sorry! I just blurted that out! M-Maybe I was just trying to distract you from... you know... this part of the game.
Of course not! Don't worry, Natsuki. I'm sure there's nobody here who is interested in seeing school shoes getting taken off.
I think there's been some kind of misunderstanding! You only have to take off one thing at a time. You don't have to show us your underwear. Um, not yet, anyway...
We'll do our best to make that wish come true. Won't we, ~player.ifMale(guys|girls)~?
We'll do our best to make that wish come true. It's just the three of us, after all.
Even if... even if someone spreads a rumor that you've never been kissed!
Ohhh, I see. I'm sure your bra is just as cute as your shirt, but I understand why you don't want to go that far if you don't have to.

Maybe ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ just waiting for the perfect moment to scoop you up and rescue you. Or... or maybe ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ was hoping for this to happen because... because ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ in love with ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ princess?
Ah! B-B-B-Bobobo! Mr. Bobobo! Your clothes just... exploded!

Mr. Bobobo, I think it's y---
eh?!
I-It's okay if you want to slow down a little! There's no need to rush into this all at once! You had that accident earlier, so we even wouldn't mind if you skipped this one. Right, everyone?
The shining light brought change to a world that had ended.

state.text: Oh!

case.state: Tomoko, you want to smell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~?!
Sanny isn't hurt, is she? Tess, should we call a doctor?
Whoa, that's so cool, Sanako. You're amazing.
No, that's okay, Fluttershy. It'll make me happy just to see you and ~player~ splash around in the water. I might look around for a spare towel, though.
That sounds like something I would do. It's nice to meet you, Fluttershy. I like you already.
Oh no. That doesn't seem fair. I think you really look the part for a queen. Um, when you have all of your dress on and your hair was like it was a minute ago, I mean.
The weather today has held up really well today, though. That water looks so inviting, doesn't it?
I hope your crewmates could at least afford both the underwear parts of the set. They wouldn't want to give angels a bad reputation.
That... that's really good advice. Wow, you really are like an angel, Meia!
Ohhhhhh... You just mean you're going to flirt with ~player~, right? You're not going to start kissing or anything, right?
Oh, Estelle, your hair is all messed up! That happens to me all the time too, especially at this time of year. No matter how hard I try, it will never all sit flat.
Whoa... real magic. That's amazing, Estelle. You could've won the whole game just by pointing your wand at people. You shouldn't, of course. That would be cheating.

M-Meia! Don't give up yet!
Oh, is that...? If you wanted to put that on, we could pretend like we didn't see anything. I'm sure everyone would be okay with that.
Ehehe, of course. I knew that... That's a pretty bikini, by the way. You're so prepared for the water.
Ohhh... you had a bikini on under there! That's so clever! It's like underwear for the ocean.
I was just wondering if a maid normally helps you out of that part of your dress. I could help you out like a maid just for to~background.time~ if you'd like.
Um, about that, Estelle...
That's a beautiful corset, Estelle. Any prince would fall in love with you in a heartbeat! But I don't think he'd want us to see you like this in your underwear...
Wow! It's like it completely disappeared! I like your hair gag too. You really know how to cheer us up, Estelle!
This is just my classroom, so I didn't have to come very far. I can give you the address if you'd like to call Ms. Yukari later.
Maybe you could guard the door for us. Just to make sure no one walks in when we're... when we're not decent...
If you wanted to do some exploring, I think there's probably lots of interesting things around here. We could call you when we're all finished.
I thought all idols had managers too. Do you have a manager? You didn't sneak out and not tell your manager you were coming, did you?!
Oh! I was expecting... um, good job, Natsuki! You did amazing!
H-Hey! That's not very nice, Revy! Stop or... or... or we'll be mad with you.
Ah! She's going to get her revenge! Watch out, everyone!
It's probably better that we don't match, though. My mom says it's best to avoid wearing the same dress as another lady at a party.
I love how your bra and panties match, Natsuki! It's almost like you knew you were going to get this far.
I looked! I think it might be burned into my memory forever now...
Even that is a special message in its own way, I suppose.
Thanks for understanding, Sanako. It's not that I dislike your body or anything... I'd like to say nice things to make you feel good...
Um, may I ask what you prefer to be called? Is it "your highness" or "your worship"? I always get those mixed up.
I wish I could be as confident as you, Sanako. Nobody's going to stay interested in a boring girl like me...
It has? Wait, but...
Oh, so you're more like a policewoman?
I think you'd make a good princess, Fina. You have a good head on your shoulders, so I don't think you'd be corrupted by it.
Ah, is that a little robot?
H-He doesn't have a camcorder inside him, does he?! Cupil wouldn't record you in the bath, would he?
I still respect you, even though you lost this fight.
Wow, exploring the world... I've never even left my town. But that's okay, because I love it very much!
Haha, mom and I can cook extra if you need us to.
Oh, wow! He's so cute! Like a little floating dango! Hello, Cupil! It's nice to meet you. My name is Nagisa Furukawa.
Even despite your situation, you're still managing to draw strength from it. You're amazing, Fina!
This is still the most embarrassing thing I've done in my entire life... but I feel a little bit safer with you joining in too, Fina.
(I shouldn't judge her. Maybe I'm a bad girl too. I kind of liked it when ~player~ was looking at me before...)
We have to respect everyone's personal space. If we want someone to hold us, we have to ask ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ permission first.
Um, thank you for being courageous enough to share your secrets with us, Fina.
Ah?! No, no, I couldn't possibly impose like that, Fluttershy!
Oh no! Were the clothes okay?
It's not... it's not a "kill shelter", is it?!

I'm proud of you for being so brave, Fluttershy.
(I'm wearing exactly the same bra and panties! This couldn't get any more embarrassing!)
Yep, it's the same two-piece set! We have a lot in common, don't we, Fluttershy?
If you can trust everyone here, maybe I can too. I've never really opened up to strangers before, but I think I could do it with a friend.
You're amazing, Fluttershy! How did you find the strength to do that? I still don't know if I could...

Isn't Fluttershy the best? A-and she is a very s-sexy woman too! Everyone knows it!
(That was so hard to say, but if it makes her feel better, it was worth it.)
Could you please be nice to me? ... I haven't done this before.
You're such a nice girl, Fluttershy. I see why you have lots of friends.
Just... I don't handle embarrassing situations very well, so I'm not sure if I'll be here for long after the game.

It wasn't just me supporting you. I think even ~player~ has been sending you positive feelings whenever you lose.
(This is a disaster. My magazine said two girls wearing the same dress is a big no-no. I hope she doesn't find out...)
But now that I see them, I think I understand how you could still be confident...
This was the last place I expected to make friends, but maybe this is proof that it's worth trying new things, even if they make our hearts race.
I might be a little biased, but I think your underwear looks very cute, Fluttershy!
